metadata.description: (Optional) Prefix applied to all resources provisioned as part of this template
DNS name for the Public IP address resource asociated with the site deployment. It needs to be unique across the region of deployment

DNS name for the site deployment. It will be a custom domain (e.g. mysite.contoso.com) if using an SSL certificate, otherwise will be the Azure DNS <dnsPrefixForPublicIpAddress>.<location>.cloudapp.azure.com
Name of a load balancer SKU. - Basic or Standard
Azure Region for the site deployment. All Resources provisioned are created here
An optional timestamp used to record as a tag which is used by ArcGIS Deployment Tools
Name of the Resource Group for the existing Virtual Network specified with the 'existingVirtualNetworkName' parameter
Name of the existing Virtual Network
Name of the existing Subnet within the Virtual Network specified with the 'existingVirtualNetworkName' parameter
Comma seperated list of names for the Server Virtual Machines
Comma seperated list of Image Type used refrencing useManagedDiskImage,userImageName,userImageResourceGroupName,imagePublisher,imageOffery and imageSKU by index
Machine size assigned to the the Server tier of Virtual Machines
Username for the Virtual Machine Administrator (Windows) Account
Password for the Virtual Machine Administrator (Windows) Account
User name for the ArcGIS (Windows) Service Account
Password for the ArcGIS (Windows) Service Account
(Optional) Indicates whether ArcGIS Service Account is a Domain Account.
User name for the ArcGIS Server Site Primary Site Administrator
User name for the ArcGIS Server Site Primary Site Administrator
Accessible file path for ArcGIS Server License
File name for the ArcGIS Server License
Accessible file path for SSL Certificate
File name for the SSL Certificate
Private Key for the SSL Certificate
(SAS) Shared Access Token for the deployment artifacts in an Azure Blob Storage Container
Fully qualified URL for the deployment artifacts location in an Azure Blob Storage Container
(Optional) Managed Disk Type for the Operating System (c Drive) Disk for the Virtual Machine(s)
(Optional) Managed Disk Size for the Operating System (c Drive) Disk for the Virtual Machine(s)
(Optional) Indicates whether an additional Managed Disk is attached to the Virtual Machine(s)
(Optional) Managed disk type for the additional (Data) disk attached to the Virtual Machine(s)
(Optional) Managed disk size for the additional (Data) disk attached to the Virtual Machine(s)
(Optional) Azure Environment for the deployment. E.g:- Public Azure, U.S. Gov. Cloud, Azure Germany, Azure China
(Optional) Server Role (or Function) for this Site deployment
Details of ArcGIS marketplace image or User Images
(Optional) Indicates whether Remote Desktop Access to the File Share Machine should be enabled.
(Optional) External Port number for Remote Desktop Access to the File Share Machine should be enabled.
(Optional) Standard Name for the timezone to set for the Virtual Machines in the deployment
(Optional) Whether to federate the site with an Enterprise Portal.
(Optional) User name for the Primary Site Administrator account of the Enterprise Portal (used to federate)
(Optional) Password for the Primary Site Administrator account of the Enterprise Portal (used to federate)
(Optional) Hostname for the Enterprise Portal (used to federate)
(Optional) Deployment Id for the site to which this site is federated to
(Optional) Comma seperate list of Server Role (functions). Allowed Values are GeoAnalytics, RasterAnalytics, ImageHosting, NotebookServer
(Optional) Type of Database registed as an Enterprise Geodatabase
User name for the Database Server administrator account
Password for the Database Server administrator account
User name for the Database User account
Password for the Database User account
Host name for the Database Server. E.g:- <myServer>.database.windows.net if SQL Database or <myServerFQDN> if SQL Server on IaaS VM
Name of the database
Is Database server to be registered Managed
Enable Geodatabase on Database to be registered
(Optional) Size of the Virtual Machine used for the SQL Server. Required if databaseOption = SQLServerDatabase
(Optional) Name of the SKU used for the SQL Server Image. Required if databaseOption = SQLServerDatabase
(Optional) Name of the Offer used for the SQL Server Image. Required if databaseOption = SQLServerDatabase
(Optional) Managed Disk Type for the Operating System (c Drive) Disk for the SQL Server Virtual Machine
(Optional) Managed Disk Size for the Operating System (c Drive) Disk for the SQL Server Virtual Machine
(Optional) Indicates whether Azure Storage is used for the server config and portal content store
(Optional) Indicates whether Azure Files (SMB protocol) is used for the server config and portal content store
(Optional) Name of the file share on the file share host
(Optional) Name of the Azure Storage Account used. Required if 'useCloudStorage' is set to true
(Optional) Name of the resource group for the Azure Storage Account specified with 'cloudStorageAccountName'. Required if 'useCloudStorage' is set to true
(Optional) Storage Account Access Key for the Azure Storage Account specified with 'cloudStorageAccountName'. Required if 'useCloudStorage' is set to true
(Optional) Azure Cloud Stores to be registered as Data Items on the ArcGIS Server
(Optional) Comma seperated list of Web/Reverse Proxy machine names from the hosting server
(Optional) Comma seperated list of GIS Server machine names from the hosting server
(Optional) Comma seperated list of Portal machine names from the hosting server
(Optional) Indicates whether to enable Automatic (Windows) Operating System updates
(Optional) Indicates whether the virtual machines should join an existing Windows Active Directory which provides domain join and DNS services in the Virtual Network
(Optional) Domain FQDN where the virtual machine will be joined. Required if joinWindowsDomain = true
(Optional) Username for the Active Directory Domain Administrator account where the virtual machine will be joined. Required if joinWindowsDomain = true
(Optional) Password for the Active Directory Domain Administrator account where the virtual machine will be joined. Required if joinWindowsDomain = true
(Optional) Indicates whether to enable debug settings on the site deployment. Used for troubleshooting only and should not be used for a Production Deployment
(Optional) Version number of the ArcGIS Software used in the deployment
Azure Monitor Logs workspace name
Azure Monitor Logs Workspace Resource Group Name
Enable Server Log Harvester Plugin
(Optional) deployment Tracking ID based on Orchestrator being Automation or Cloud Builder
